project_summary.title: Where is the question - Chrome Extension
project_summary.purpose: This extension helps users navigate long chat histories in ChatGPT and Gemini by placing markers on the scrollbar for each user question. Clicking a marker scrolls to that question.

gemini_development.status: Successfully integrated and working with deep performance optimizations.
gemini_development.key_challenge: Identifying stable HTML selectors and maintaining high performance during frequent DOM updates in long chat histories.
gemini_development.future_debugging_notes: Refer to GEMINI_DEV_NOTES.md for a full summary and a guide on how to debug future issues with Gemini integration.

latest_changes: Deep performance refactoring of `MarkerManager` (content.js) using `WeakMap` for caching and batched DOM reads.
Optimized text extraction in `config.js` by removing `cloneNode` and using direct DOM traversal.
Enhanced `isQuestion` logic with better regex and Korean support.
Improved DOM utilities in `dom.js` with scroll container caching and `getBoundingClientRect` for positioning.
Fixed popup UI bug where HTML tags were displayed in the question list.
Updated `README.md` with troubleshooting tips (refresh page instruction).
